consistency_issues.description: 🤖 AI: Floating-point arithmetic used for financial calculations (Money.as_double()) can cause precision loss and rounding errors in PnL calculations

patterns_detected.description: Using floating-point arithmetic for monetary calculations can lead to precision errors, rounding issues, and financial discrepancies
Returning None instead of the expected Money type breaks type consistency and can cause downstream crashes
